title: Account hacked, requesting ban.
body: Hey, so my account got hacked yesterday, but I'm already talking to support about this(should I post the quest number here?). Can you tell me what info  didn't match? Also, do you guys ban  accounts if requested? If you do, I want you guys to ban my account (dragovich5d is the account). Thanks.

replies.body: Since you're already working with a recovery specialist on this, I recommend directing any questions regarding the account in your ticket. We definitely *cannot* ban account on request, but if you have any other questions, let me know.
